ComicInfo.Title: The Face of Horror; Cave of Doom; The Dead Sleep Lightly; Devil's Due; Weird Facts
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Face of Horror: A man and his sister buy an old dilapidated house. They (and a mutual friend on a visit) are stalked by the previous owner; A creepy lunatic who had just escaped a mental asylum.
Cave of Doom: While looking for a new branch of prehistoric man, two anthropologists enter a frozen cave in Antarctica and awaken a frozen giant.
The Dead Sleep Lightly: Miners are attacked by the undead because the new mine shafts are disturbing their graves.
Devil's Due: A man who has been ruined by his fellow stockholders asks the devil to help him get revenge. After the men are killed, the devil has him killed too.
Weird Facts: A write up on various mysteries like the Jersey Devil and the Brown Lady of Raynham Hall.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Vic Donahue,Al Avison,Manny Stallman,Rudy Palais,Vic Donahue,Al Avison,Manny Stallman,Rudy Palais
ComicInfo.Inker: Vic Donahue,Al Avison,John Giunta,Rudy Palais,Vic Donahue,Al Avison,John Giunta,Rudy Palais
